openerSection: HDFC bank offers two credit cards in the super-premium category- HDFC Infinia and HDFC Bank Diners Club Black credit card. Both these credit cards offer a 24×7 concierge service, unlimited airport lounge access, complimentary rounds of golf at some of the handouts best golf destinations worldwide, and many other premium benefits. HDFC targets individuals with high net worth with these credit cards. If you're searching for a premium card, you can pick any of the two, you won't go wrong with either.

HDFC Diners Club Black Credit Card is better suited for you if you see yourself spending a substantial portion of your total credit card spends on popular apps/websites like Zomato, Ola, Amazon Prime, BookMyShow, etc. Keep reading to know more about this credit card –
cardTitle: HDFC Bank Diners Club Black Credit Card
andThereIsMore: Complimentary annual membership of subscription platforms like Amazon Prime, Zomato Gold, Times Prime, etc, as a Welcome Benefit. These memberships are renewed on the expenditure of Rs. 8,00,000 in the anniversary year with HDFC Bank Diners Club Black credit card.
Complimentary Ola Select, TataCliQ, BookMyShow, and cure.fit Live vouchers on spends of over Rs. 80,000 every month.
5 Reward Points for every Rs. 150 spent (Reward Rate = 3.3%).
6 complimentary golf games per quarter at some of the most premium golf destinations around the world.
Low foreign currency markup fee of 1.99%.
Unlimited lounge access at 1,000 plus airport lounges in India and abroad.
Travel insurance benefits including an air accident cover worth Rs. 2 crore.

welcomeGifts: Complimentary annual membership of subscription platforms like Amazon Prime, Zomato Gold, Times Prime, etc, as a Welcome Benefit. These memberships are renewed on the expenditure of Rs. 8,00,000 in the anniversary year with HDFC Bank Diners Club Black credit card.
rewardsPoints: 5 Reward Points for every Rs. 150 spent (Reward Rate = 3.3%).

Welcome Benefits: Complimentary memberships for a year to MMTDOUBLEBLACK, Zomato Gold, Club Marriott, Times Prime, and Amazon Prime.
Movie & Dining: 2X Reward Points on weekend dining, complimentary annual membership of Zomato Gold.
Rewards Rate: 5 Reward Points for every Rs. 150 spent, accelerated Reward Points while spending on SmartBuy
Reward Redemption: HDFC Bank Diners Club Black Reward Points are redeemable for flight/hotel bookings (1 RP = Re. 1) on SmartBuy, for AirMiles (1 RP = 1 AirMile), on Diners Club exclusive rewards redemption catalog (1 RP = Re. 0.5) and for cashbacks (1RP = Rs. 0.30).
Travel: Complimentary lounge access at 1,000+ airports in India and abroad, Reward Points redeemable for flight and hotel bookings on SmartBuy (1RP = Re. 1).
Golf: 6 complimentary golf games per quarter at some of the most premium golf destinations around the world.
Domestic Lounge Access: Unlimited complimentary access to the domestic lounges
International Lounge Access: Unlimited complimentary access to the international lounges
Insurance Benefits: Travel-related insurance benefits including an air accident cover worth Rs. 2 crores and a credit liability cover worth up to Rs. 9 lakh.
Zero Liability Protection: Zero liability protection worth Rs. 9 lakh against a lost/stolen card.

Spend based Waiver: Waiver of renewal fee on spending Rs. 5,00,000 in the previous year.
Fuel Surcharge: 1% fuel surcharge waived (max waiver capped at Rs. 1,000/month and min transaction of  Rs. 400 required).
Cash Advance Charge: Higher of 2.5% of the amount withdrawn or Rs. 500.
